mapper.select: SELECT t.member_id FROM reservation r JOIN trip_day td ON r.trip_day_id = td.trip_day_id JOIN trip t ON td.trip_id = t.trip_id WHERE r.reservation_id = #{reservationId}

SELECT rr.reservation_id AS reservationId, rr.rest_id AS restId, td.day AS date, rts.res_time AS time, rr.res_num AS resNum, rr.status FROM REST_RES rr JOIN TRIP_DAY td ON rr.trip_day_id = td.trip_day_id JOIN REST_TIME_SLOT rts ON rr.rest_time_id = rts.rest_time_id WHERE rr.reservation_id = #{reservationId}
